mapper.select: SELECT area_code, area.city_code, area.name as area_name, sub_name FROM vitamin.vi_area_code as area join vitamin.vi_city_code as city on area.city_code = city.city_code

select * from (select * from vi_recruit_write where recruiting_state = 1 and recruit_date_end > current_date()) recruit join (select * from vi_form_service) form_service on recruit.form_service = form_service.form_service_type join (select * from vi_school_level) school on recruit.school_level = school.level join (select * from vi_address) address on recruit.address_no = address.address_no join (select * from vi_city_code) city on address.city_code = city.city_code join (select * from vi_area_code) area on address.area_code = area.area_code join vi_company on recruit.company_no = vi_company.company_no
order by recruit_no desc
